mention.text: MOSCOW , May 26 -LRB- RIA Novosti -RRB- , Rick Rozoff - U.S. Army Europe
the Hohenfels Training Area in Germany
new NATO members in Eastern Europe
NATO and many Allied and Partnered nations
The website of the Joint Multinational Readiness Center

the U.S. and NATO allies assisting in the formation of a new German army , the Bundeswehr , in West Germany in 1955 and its immediate incorporation into NATO -LRB- thereby provoking the Soviet Union and its Eastern European allies to found the Warsaw Pact -RRB-
Stage two of Washington 's use of NATO to train , deploy and employ the international military force that they have jointly crafted in the post-Cold War era
